title: RUDEBOY.ISO
description:
RUDE BOY (1980)

Directors:Jack Hazan
          David Mingay

Writers:  Ray Gange (writer)
          David Mingay (writer)


Genre:         Drama / Music
Tagline:       Featuring The Clash. 
Plot Summary:  Rude Boy is a semi-documentary, part character study, part 'rockumentary', featuring a British punk band.
 
Plot Keywords: Concert Tour / Rock Music / Punk Rock / England / Racism
Awards:        1 win & 1 nomination

Filming locations for
Rude Boy (1980)

Birmingham, West Midlands, England, UK 
(Concert footage from the Barbarellas)


Dunfermline, Fife, Scotland, UK 
(Concert footage from the Kinema)


Glasgow, Strathclyde, Scotland, UK 
(Concert footage from the Apollo)


Victoria Park, Hackney, London, England, UK 
(Concert footage from Rock Against Racism Carnival)
